Job Description: Job Role for HR:     It is an role of IT Recruiter      This Resource will help the organisation in finding Talents wrt the Job Descriptions that are provided      Should have Good Attitude      Knowledge in Excel is good to have      Should have scored Decent Marks (60%) in the Graduation or Post Graduation.     Job Role for Data Analyst:     Candidate      This doesn t involve any travel.      This Resource will help the organisation in data Collection.      Should have good Communication skills      Knowledge in Excel is good to have    SkillSet HR, Recruitment, Sales, Marketing. Fresher to 6 Months Education
